22.heading: Aches.
22.title: "Making the Break"
22.author: Neg Cochran.
notes: Summary: The boy who collected his green apples in baskets gets a chance to sell them; he gets greenbacks and the others just get green around the gills: "You're more likely to get the nod from Lady Luck if you're willing to give her an assist."
Key words: Money, stomach aches. Call no.: PN6726f.B55 "luck"

24.heading: Acheson, Dean.
24.title: "Preguntas y Respuestas" 1 p. fact feature in Acción Policíaca, no. 74
24.author: [No author]
24.series: Jan. 1958) ; appears also in Acción Policíaca, no. 81
notes: Two 1/2 p. true or false quizzes. The first asks about a march, Dean Acheson, the word "hincha," Tegucigalpa, and the distance between Earth and the sun. The second asks about Julius Caesar, the U.S. Supreme Court, the bicycle, tennis, and Vermont.
